name: tm63
effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.
short_effect: Teaches Embargo to a compatible Pokémon.

flavor_text.sun-moon: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text.ultra-sun-ultra-moon: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
flavor_text.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee: This move prevents the target from using its held item for five turns. Its Trainer is also prevented from using items on it.
